content.rendered:
The world witnessed one of the biggest humanitarian crises of all time as the pandemic struck globally. Caught between the hustle and bustle of life, we completely forgot what it meant to be at home, at ease. The lockdown brought the world to a standstill and provoked us to reiterate our thoughts to invest and reconstruct our ideas for healthy housing. People have begun to understand the value of safe living with a holistic perspective that ensures wellness for Mind, Body & Soul.

The idea of a perfect home begins when we, at Gulshan, build luxury upon the convenience that you dream of—establishing true wellness into a whole new dimension by creating homes of your dreams. Three decades since its inception, Gulshan has carved out an empire that makes genuine value for people. Catering to that need, Gulshan’s new real estate project GULSHAN DYNASTY redefines luxury as holistic wellness for its residents.

5.8 acres of extravagance,

3 towers surrounded by undisturbed nature,

34 floors of sky-high amenities,

198 apartments to choose from and

6 duplexes.

In the middle of sector 144 amidst construction-free spaces, Gulshan Dynasty elevates and brings the first luxury wellness homes in North India. The low-density project with 4BHK apartments with state-of-the-art amenities and shortens the distance to a line-up of hotspots, from airport to hospitals and universities to reputed schools.

GULSHAN DYNASTY is a perfect culmination of your lifelong dreams synchronized with our efforts. Here are 6 reasons why you should get hold of an ultra-luxury house at the GULSHAN DYNASTY:

  1. Urban Infrastructure: With rising demand for projects offering less cluttered and more organic spacing, we believe in making a conscious effort to provide you with homes that are both ecologically and structurally capable.

A good look outside into the green space is a rare sight in contrast to the city’s usual vertical thrust that alludes to a unique sense of tranquillity. We offer larger-than-life spaces that include only two apartments per floor with a triple-height private lobby, prominent glass facades, and open terraces to maximize exposure to sunlight while optimizing shading and leveraging cross-ventilation.

“Live Life King Size!” in the master suite equipped with an emperor size bed, ensuite dressing area, laminated wooden flooring, and spacious baths with glass interiors. You can customize your interiors to your heart’s content as Dynasty provides you with the leading industry specialists. We also have an underground parking system with a private electric car charging facility and a driver’s lounge to ensure pedestrian circulation and safety on roads.

  1. Biophilic Design: Studies suggest that greenery housing helps relieve stress and boost mental and physical health. It also aids in improving the air quality, reduces traffic noise and cooler temperatures in the scorching summers. GULSHAN DYNASTY has developed multiple reflexology paths, meditation gardens, lotus ponds, and waterfall. Our strategic plantation with medicinal plants is mosquito repellent and purifies the air. We provide you with the luxury of your own green space at the heart of a flourishing neighborhood.
  2. Wellness centers: We, at GULSHAN DYNASTY, believe that building homes are much more than laying concrete; we build havens. We focus on physical and mental wellness through our first-of-its-kind leisure rooftop recreational centers catering to every age group. From a sports center with AC Gym, squash court, and a temperature-regulated swimming pool to sunbathing decks and meditation grounds for spiritual healing, GULSHAN DYNASTY has it all! We also offer trainers and instructors providing special fitness classes for our residents and a premium spa with Steam Sauna and a Jacuzzi.
  1. Entertainment Hub: GULSHAN DYNASTY marks an epitome of crème de la crème with its high-rise urban environment and many services to choose from. For your social wellness, we promote activities within our high-end community club. The sky is the limit, and our rooftop recreation center with a private theatre and barbeque zone sets the perfect tone for an evening of entertainment under the stars. Your children need a childhood to cherish, and our open space kids play area, specially designed with safe and modern equipment, is just what they need. And wait, there is more, a coffee corner for you to nestle in, a card room to try your hand, and pet stead for your furry friends run by professional pet sitters.
  1. Sustainable Living: Holistic living starts with maintaining your surrounding environment, and GULSHAN DYNASTY does not shy away from assuming its responsibilities. We encourage sustainable living options by integrating our estate with eco-friendly resources. Our houses have TFA (Treated Fresh Air) outlets with HEPA (High-efficiency Particulate Absorbing) filters for improved air quality. Power is generated from solar panels to light up the common areas—waste treatment through STP (Sewage Treatment Plant) management and irrigation to eliminate carbon footprint. We believe in growing our own food, and through our hydroponic farming chambers, we facilitate nutrient-rich organic vegetables at your doorstep.
  1. Security First: GULSHAN DYNASTY is built to ensure safe and secure housing for its residents. It becomes challenging to safeguard our privacy between life’s congestion, but we make it our priority at Dynasty. We have customized your home security with 7 tier advanced features, such as biometrics with RFID Vehicle Tags, a Society Security App, Digital Detection in lobbies, 24/7 CCTV surveillance, and trained guards with dog squads.
  1. Safe and Sanitized: We understand the importance of adhering to the Covid -19 protocols and safeguarding the interests of our residents. We have a regular temperature check and sanitization for every visitor on-site.

Indian Green Building Council pre-certified GULSHAN DYNASTY as the first real estate project in Noida with a Platinum rating, the Highest Level of Green Building affiliation. Projects like GULSHAN DYNASTY commit to yield a higher quality of living, luxury with a carbon footprint, and generating healthier lifestyle opportunities. Find the key to your happiness with your dream home at GULSHAN DYNASTY!
